Mar 10, 2024


HOW WE BUILT A BEAUTIFUL 41KB SAAS WEBSITE WITH THIS TEMPLATE

How to use this template you to bootstrap your own site.

We've written a detailed blog post about how we took this template, and created
a real SaaS company website [https://criticalmoments.io]. Topics include:

 * Optimizing the stack for performance and developer productivity
 * Creating rich interactive animations with Svelte
 * Creating pixel perfect designs without rasterization
 * Speed measurements: how we kept it small and lightning fast

Read the Blog Post
[https://criticalmoments.io/blog/how_we_built_our_marketing_page]

The blog post is over on criticalmoments.io [https://criticalmoments.io], a page
which uses this boilerplate as a starting point.

If you are looking for examples of blog posts with rich content rendered inside
this template, checkout the other demo posts here [/blog].

 * ★ us on Github [https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter]

SaaS Starter Demo
The open source, fast, and free to host SaaS template
Built with SvelteKit [https://kit.svelte.dev], Supabase [https://supabase.com],
Stripe [https://stripe.com], Tailwind [https://tailwindcss.com], DaisyUI
[https://daisyui.com], and Postgres [https://www.postgresql.org]
★ us on Github [https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter] Read the Docs
[https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter/tree/main#saas-starter]
Explore the Features
And try them on this fully functional demo


FREE TO HOST

Instructions included for Cloudflare+Supabase. Free to start, and cost effective
to scale.

Docs
[https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter?tab=readme-ov-file#suggested-hosting-stack]


USER AUTH

Sign up, sign out, forgot password, email verification, and oAuth. Powered by
Supabase Auth.

Try It [/login]


PRICING PAGE

Customizable and fast pricing page, integrated into the billing portal.

Try It [/pricing]


BLOG

Blog engine with rich formatting, RSS and SEO optimization.

Try It [/blog]


SUBSCRIPTIONS

User friendly subscriptions powered by Stripe Checkout.

Try It [/pricing]


BILLING PORTAL

Self-serve portal for updating card, receipts, upgrades, downgrades and more.

Try It [/account/billing]


USER DASHBOARD

User profile, user settings, update email/password, billing, and more.

Try It [/account/settings]


CONTACT US

Contact form for customers to reach out for demos, quotes, and questions.

Try It [/contact_us]


EMAIL

Send emails to users, including template support.

Docs [https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter/blob/main/email_docs.md]


PERFORMANCE

Pre-rendering. Compiled on deployment to remove unused CSS/JS. Perfect 100/100
Google performance scores.

Docs
[https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter?tab=readme-ov-file#performance--best-practices]


RESPONSIVE

Designed for mobile and desktop.


DELIGHTFUL STACK

Tools you'll love working with, including SvelteKit, Tailwind, DaisyUI,
Postgres, and Supabase.

Docs
[https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter?tab=readme-ov-file#tech-stack]


EXTENSIBLE

All the tools you need to make additional marketing pages, UI components, admin
portals, database backends, API endpoints, and more.


DEVELOPER EXPERIENCE

Built in linting, type checking, formatting, and test framework. Run locally in
your editor, and on Github CI.

Docs
[https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter?tab=readme-ov-file#developer-tools]


SCALABLE

Handle new users and scale with horizontally scaling edge functions.


EXTENSIONS

Community extensions for internationalization, dark mode theme, and more.

Docs
[https://github.com/CriticalMoments/CMSaasStarter?tab=readme-ov-file#community-extensions]
See it in Action
https://criticalmoments.io

PRICING


TOTALLY FREE, SCALE TO MILLIONS OF USERS

Free

A free plan to get you started!

Plan Includes:
 * MIT Licence
 * Fast Performance
 * Stripe Integration
   

$0 per month
Get Started [/account/subscribe/free_plan]
Pro

A plan to test the purchase experience. Try buying this with the test credit
card 4242424242424242.

Plan Includes:
 * Everything in Free
 * Support us with fake money
 * Test the purchase experience
   

$5 per month
Get Started [/account/subscribe/price_1NkdZCHMjzZ8mGZnRSjUm4yA]
Enterprise

A plan to test the upgrade experience. Try buying this with the test credit card
4242424242424242.

Plan Includes:
 * Everything in Pro
 * Try the 'upgrade plan' UX
 * Still actually free!
   

$15 per month
Get Started [/account/subscribe/price_1Nkda2HMjzZ8mGZn4sKvbDAV]


PRICING FAQ

Is this template free to use?

Yup! This template is free to use for any project.

Why does a free template have a pricing page?

The pricing page is part of the boilerplate. It shows how the pricing page
integrates into the billing portal and the Stripe Checkout flows.

What license is the template under?

The template is under the MIT license.

Can I try out purchase flows without real a credit card?

Our demo page SaasStarter.work [https://saasstarter.work] has a functional demo
page, using Stripe's test environment.

You can use the credit card number 4242 4242 4242 4242 with any future expiry
date to test the payment and upgrade flows.


PLAN FEATURES


EXAMPLE FEATURE TABLE

Free Pro Section 1 Feature 1 Feature 2 Feature 3 3 Unlimited Section 2 Feature 4
Feature 5
